Author: GitHub
Description:
Learn how to offload heavy lifting from your local machine to the cloud using the /delegate command in GitHub Copilot CLI. In this demo, @shanselman shows how to task an agent with upgrading a Next.js application while he continues to work. See how the agent creates a pull request, runs tests, and streams logs back to you.

#GitHubCopilot #CopilotCLI #delegate

Title: Demo: Using /delegate in the GitHub Copilot CLI
